website_summaries.verdict: An organic mouthwash that is packed with natural extracts, essential oils, and minerals to improve dental health.
pros: Simultaneously keeps your mouth clean and healthy while reducing plaque with powerful cleansing properties of myrrh and zinc citrate
Contains pure peppermint and spearmint oils, which can help you get rid of mouth odors
Includes a natural blend of chamomile, sage, and aloe, all of which soothe painful and inflamed gums
cons: Formula may be too potent for some users

customer_reviews.title: very effective
customer_reviews.text: It works. Your mouth feels amazingly clean after. Note: if you are trying to brighten your smile and are concerned about dry mouth, you can try swishing a whitener mouthwash (2 or 3 minutes) before brushing your teeth. Then, brush and then swish the tea tree brand for another 2-3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Natural Tea Tree Oil Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a couple of years now. It leaves the mouth feeling clean without any after taste. It seems also to help heal minor mouth irritations. I am sold on it.
customer_reviews.author: K.W. Bangs

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: We switched to this brand after ignorantly using Listerine for years.... This mouthwash is very natural and it’s not full of chemicals that ruin your gums & teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Ilieva

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: This tastes horrifically disgusting. I won't put myself through that again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I love Desert Essence Tea Tree Oil Mouthwash, so when I saw this product with "ULtra Care" included in the name, I was really looking forward to it. This stuff is AWFUL -- I wish I could give it zero (or even negative) stars. Not eligible for return, so I threw it out. It smells like turpentine or nail polish remover, or something harmful. Extremely disappointed, and a review of my product reviews will show that I've only been disappointed less than 1/10 of 1 percent of my many purchases over the past 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: memh

customer_reviews.title: Been searching for this type of product for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few weeks, replacing my old brand that was filled with sweeteners. My breath is fresher, teeth are whiter, gums are healthier, and I'm not paranoid about unknown chemical additives anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Kyle

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOUTHWASH EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT mouthwash. No stinging, no aftertaste, no irritation. Just gives you a really clean mouth. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the toothpaste and recommend it also
customer_reviews.text: Tastes kind of gross when you first put it in your mouth but tastes really minty soon after. I use this an desert essence toothpaste. I absolutely love the toothpaste and recommend it also. I've only used the mouthwash a few times but like it so far. May buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great product for fresh breath
customer_reviews.text: Great product for fresh breath. The minty flavor stays with you for a long time. Wish this product was under the subscribe and save program. Also wish this product was in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Lenci

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product ever for soar and bleeding gums
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product ever for soar and bleeding gums. I've purchase other organic mouth wash products and nothing compares to this product. Works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mica

customer_reviews.title: Just can’t get over the disgusting taste
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes toxic. But I have to admit my mouth felt so much cleaner after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Does not have a convenient lid cup but not biggie
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: this is the first time trying this mouthwash and we love it!
customer_reviews.text: works very well. this is the first time trying this mouthwash and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: thecount546

customer_reviews.title: Gives very fresh feeling; tastes a bit peculiar
customer_reviews.text: Leaves mouth feeling very fresh. I find the taste a bit strange -- must be the tea tree oil, which, though, I believe may be killing some bacteria and protecting my teeth during the night.
customer_reviews.author: burninghorse

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My Mouth feels fresh and clean all day. No bad, harsh chemicals and no alcohol that is a plus. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: objectiveCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but it is good stuff without all the alcohol found in others.
customer_reviews.author: Caledonia Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great mouthwash! I wish there was a whitening effect too but does a great job for being so natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day to help keep Thrush at bay. Due to my asthma inhalers, even though I rinse well each use, I still get Thrush in my mouth. This mouthwash is the only one I've found that works as well as the meds the doctor gives me, and it's cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E. Bainter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use their toothpaste, as I do not like the taste of film that commercial brands have. Ps. I am grateful this does not have fluoride in it. Due to dietary changes, my breathe was becoming bad until I bought this. This is awesome stuff. Love using this twice a day with their Tea Tree and Neem toothpaste. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good mouth wash
customer_reviews.text: I love mint flavoring, so I figured that I would give this a try. My husband and I switched to natural products with in the last 2 to 3 years. I was a little bit disappointed by the flavor of this. It is not quit a refreshing mint that you would expect. However, it does get the job done and works well and does the job at making your mouth feel clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary N Jordan Walters

customer_reviews.title: keeps mouth fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: I like tea tree oil products so I wanted to try this out. Keeps mouth feeling refreshed and clean. For us it lasts a while. We like that the ingredients are more naturally focused and doens't have lots of junk commonly found in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: consciousmommy

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: love this mouth wash, will leave your mouth feeling clean. I like how after using this I can clearly see where i need to use my dental picks to scrap off tarter build-up. I had a little upper gums problem and after using this for a while its better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.J

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a while and will continue using it. It's a very good healthy product. Very hygienic and healthy. Will recommend this product for everyone and daily use. Happy with this purchase, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Singh

customer_reviews.title: Tea tree oil sounded good
customer_reviews.text: Tea tree oil is proven to help with germs and infections. It tastes terrible however. It was kind of expensive. I think the Listerine does just as well, did a small experiment, and tasted better.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth K. Hroncich

customer_reviews.title: Tasters Choice
customer_reviews.text: At first taste, this product reminded me of another brand which a purchased at a local store. That one I threw out. Although this tastes the same initially, the after taste is less annoying. It does freshen the breath and seems to keep working for a while.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: I was getting a little tired of NEEM
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I got it in my head this was going to be a harsh mouth wash. I found it not offensive. I feel like it makes my mouth feel fresh and it's a great change compared to all the other mouthwash options I have my local health food store.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best on market for a toothache
customer_reviews.text: I love how gast this works for a tooth ache. I use it when i get a bad tooth ache and it helps so fast. I prefer this over orajel
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Splendid mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash may taste a bit odd during your first try. But, when you give it some time to kick in, this stuff is incredibly MINTY! This is probably one of the best mouthwashes I've ever used, especially considering how there's no alcohol in it. I just wish the price was a little lower.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: like propylene glycol etc
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mouthwash through Amazon so I didn't have to make a trip to Whole Foods. It does the job! Tom's brand is what I have by the store closest to my house but it's too sugary/minty tasting and most of their products have junk in it... like propylene glycol etc.
customer_reviews.author: dogdix666

customer_reviews.title: After taste is strong
customer_reviews.text: The after taste is a bit strong, but aside from that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Beachbunny

customer_reviews.title: I was dealing with bad breathe and taste from pregnancy and this is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for months along with the desert essence toothpaste. My gums rarely bleed from flossing. My dental hygienist has also remarked on it. I was dealing with bad breathe and taste from pregnancy and this is the only product that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Habiba

customer_reviews.title: love all of the desert essence mouthwash products
customer_reviews.text: love all of the desert essence mouthwash products. this one is stronger and more tingly than their other tea tree mouthwash. does a fantastic job of keeping your gums, teeth and overall mouth healthy.
customer_reviews.author: TwentySomething

customer_reviews.title: Clean and healthy mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor and the prompt freshness in your mouth
customer_reviews.author: Carmonsr

customer_reviews.title: tea oil mouthwash.  it works
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly tasting. It lessened tongue problem I had from using asthma oral steroids. Not harsh on irritated tongue tip as some mouthwashes with alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: l m miller

customer_reviews.title: fresh and intense
customer_reviews.text: more intense the the original flavor, which I appreciate because it really feels like it's cleaning. I sometimes put in a few drops of tea tree oil to really kick it up a notch.I also recommend their toothpicks.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Y

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't taste bad either!
customer_reviews.text: Has a lingering freshness that other mouthwashes lack. It doesn't taste bad either!
customer_reviews.author: M. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: It takes a couple of days to get used to ...
customer_reviews.text: It takes a couple of days to get used to the taste but it works well and helps you stay fresh for a couple of hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too strong, try the regular strength.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the tea tree mouthwash from this brand before, but not the UltraCare - this formula is too potent and tastes unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flavor with just a hint of the Tea Tree ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flavor with just a hint of the Tea Tree taste. It does not burn like some commercial mouthwash does.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: very good!
customer_reviews.text: It is all natural, does not include alcohol or sugar like most mouthwashes. Clean fresh feeling.
customer_reviews.author: MariaB

customer_reviews.title: Great mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Nice minty flavor but not over the top, and makes my mouth feel very fresh. My dentist recommended it as my gums tend to bleed and it has helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Grown-up Tinkerbelle

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, however I did notice it still has ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, however I did notice it still has Glycerin in it. So once me and husband finish the bottle, we will try a different brand. The taste is not appealing but it does leave my breath minty fresh so it does the job well. I give it 4 stars due to the Glycerin.
customer_reviews.author: NColli

customer_reviews.title: No pain
customer_reviews.text: Had to get used to the taste, but my mouth feels clean after use and it doesn't hurt like some brands do.
customer_reviews.author: MommyPerez

customer_reviews.title: Safety seal is too difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: The safety seal has nothing to grip onto. I spent 5 minutes trying to open the bottle. I pierced the seal with a sharp object to try to peel some back and ended up spilling it. The mouthwash itself is pretty good, but I will look for a product that can be opened properly.
customer_reviews.author: Guapo

product_meta.title: Desert Essence Natural Tea Tree Oil Ultra Care Mouthwash - Mega Mint - 16 Fl Oz - Freshens Breath - Defends Against Sugar Acids - Vitamin C - Soothes Gums - Whitening Floss - Removes Food Debris
feature_bullets: Helps keep mouth clean and healthy
A comforting blend of Chamomile, Sage, and Aloe helps soothe gums while powerful Australian Tea Tree Oil helps defend teeth against sugar acids
Pure Peppermint and Spearmint Oils give your mouth a boost of mega freshness
For best results, use with Ultra Care Toothpaste and Desert Essence Dental Floss
